${ModID}:Wither.NAME: Wither
${ModID}:Wither.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ruin to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
${ModID}:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unstable. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Construct.NAME: Construct
${ModID}:Construct.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unstable. NL Take !M! less damage from attacks this turn. NL Gain 2 Weak.

${ModID}:Unbind.NAME: Unbind
${ModID}:Unbind.DESCRIPTION: Discard all non-Attack cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Diffusion.NAME: Diffusion
${ModID}:Diffusion.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Entropy and draw a card.

${ModID}:Entanglement.NAME: Entanglement
${ModID}:Entanglement.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive a debuff, apply !M! ${ModID}:Ruin to a random enemy.
